name: One Minute of Hell
description:
Help piggy  survive from Hell to reach destination ,  and survive from hell of one minute. Piggy can get more time by getting coins, (Bronze +1, Silver +5, Gold +10)

Controls (Windows) :

Move : Arrow Key / WASD

Jump : Space/Enter

Dash : Left Shift/Left Control/Right Shift/Right Control

Joystick  (might be different mapping to your Joycon, just test the button )

X : Jump 

Square : Dash
